abstract: Federal prosecutor Kristy J Greenberg of Manhattan discloses additional potential victims in case of Alonzo Knowles, Bahamian man who stands accused of hacking personal information of celebrities and others; Knowles, who is charged with identity theft and criminal copyright infringement, is considering plea bargain.
lead_paragraph: A federal prosecutor in Manhattan said other possible victims have emerged in the case of Alonzo Knowles, who is accused of breaking into email accounts to acquire personal information about famous people.

headline.main: U.S. Finds More Possible Victims in Hacking of Celebrities’ Email Accounts
headline.print_headline: U.S. Uncovers  More Victims  in Hacking

snippet: A federal prosecutor in Manhattan said other possible victims have emerged in the case of Alonzo Knowles, who is accused of breaking into email accounts to acquire personal information about famous people.
